task_summary: Robot visually locates and approaches a pink towel.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a bimanual robot required to locate and approach a pink towel placed on a work surface. The robot attempts visual detection, retries if the towel is not visible, and then aligns and positions its end-effector above the towel, stopping at a safe offset. No grasp or manipulation occurs; the objective is to reach above the towel using precise movement. The process leverages visual perception, safe approach strategies, and brief wait verification. Constraints include workspace boundaries and non-contact approach. The scene consists of the robot, towel, green mat, and background objects.
preconditions: Towel is present and visible in the workspace
Robot is powered on and initialized
No major obstacles block robot path
stepwise_plan: Retry scan if needed (up to 3 attempts)
Move end-effector above towel with offset
success_criteria: Robot end-effector is above towel at target offset
Towel is correctly detected and approached
failure_and_recovery: Detection errors: fallback to next scan attempt
task_long_description.termination: After wait phase or upon unrecoverable failure in approach

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Scans workspace for the towel using a grid pattern. Retries if not visible.
Positions end-effector above the towel at a 10cm offset.
Approaches and aligns precisely over the towel.
Waits briefly to confirm arrival over towel.

failure_modes: Movement to target above towel fails
recovery_strategy: Retry scan for towel (up to 3 attempts)
Abort if approach or alignment not achievable
assumptions: Instruction does not mention grasp, only to reach; no grasp performed per frames
No manipulation beyond approach observed in all frames
Frames depict robot approaching towel but not contacting or grasping, so some implicit steps from instruction omitted

expected_success_criteria: Robot end-effector centered above towel, at specified offset
